entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , McCreary
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:31 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: McCreary 11:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -27.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -36

Wind: NNE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local blowing snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
